As the skies turn red and the planet trembles, Japan stands on the brink of disaster. However, a determined teenager named Suzume sets out on a mission to save her country. Able to see supernatural paths that others cannot, it's up to her to complete the missions and stop the mysterious creatures that are spreading chaos across the land. A perilous journey awaits as the fate of Japan rests on her shoulders. She is stressed out, therefore, she is reaching out to your team for help.
Play now to join her on her adventure!
